DOC.brief_summary: This study compare ability pulsed-dose oxygen concentrator reverse altitude-induced hypoxemia compare compress gas standard oxygen cylinder .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Oxygen Delivery Devices Reversal Altitude-Induced Hypoxemia Normal Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects monitor non-invasively pulse oximetry , end-tidal carbon dioxide , tissue oxygenation ECG . The mean seal level oxygen saturation recorded.Subjects expose altitude 14,000 foot experience moderate hypobaric hypoxia . The mean oxygen saturation altitude 83 % . Subjects receive oxygen oxygen concentrator cylinder oxygen follow exposure hypobarism . Oxygen source increase 1 liter per minute increment oxygen saturation return baseline sea level oxygen saturation . The oxygen requirement return oxygen saturation baseline value record . The flow concentrator cylinder compare .
DOC.criteria: Current altitude chamber certification Age 18 year 60 year Current upper respiratory infection Current symptom low respiratory infection productive cough
